createWalletDescription: Choose this option if this is your first time using cryptocurrency.
restoreWalletDescription: Enter your mnemonic seed and optional mnemonic passphrase to restore an existing wallet.

phraseRecordForm.title: Recovery phrase
phraseRecordForm.info:
By clicking 'Reveal' below you will be able to view a set of random words.
This is your wallet recovery phrase, write it down and keep it in a safe place. You will be required to repeat it during the next step.
Anyone with this phrase will have access to your funds.

passphraseForm.title: Recovery passphrase
passphraseForm.info:
If you set a recovery passphrase when you created your wallet you must enter it here.
Otherwise skip this step.
passphraseForm.moreInfo: For more information about recovery passphrases
